name: Low Res Entry
description:
Updates people, updates:
-Added ammo to make it harder 
-Ammo UI
-You can now die and win
-Only some guns now have lasers and you are less accurate with some guns

TO-DO:
-minimap
-more enemies
-bigger map, or more smaller ones

OR, read the text file that comes with the game named "Upcomming Updates".
